title: Ross Noble: Off Road
overview: Award-winning comedian and broadcaster, Ross Noble, returns to Dave following his acclaimed series Ross Noble Freewheeling with a brand-new, three-part UKTV Original that sees him once again take to the road on two wheels to undertake one of the biggest challenges of his life.This time a camera crew follows Noble as he takes part in the Scottish Six Days Trial, a legendary challenge where the best motorbike riders in the world come together to race a hundred miles each day in a true test of stamina, ability and willpower. It's a race that's defeated countless seasoned professionals who've been riding all their life, and certainly isn't for the faint-hearted - or foolhardy comedians.Training during every second of spare time and helped along the way by his coach James Burroughs, can Ross conquer one of the toughest sporting challenges known to man?
